entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] [Bug]: New documentation comment tags are not closed automatically, manually closing results in automatic insertion #68481
  • [LSP] [Bug]: No suggestions displayed when attempting to add a new documentation comment tag #68480
  • [LSP] [Feature Request]: Improve adding new lines to documentation comments #68479
  • Post-Build Analyzer Reporting: Log analyzer performance metrics in Sarif v2 #68476
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer #68469
  • Go-to definition doesn't work anymore on project references #68472
  • Sticky Scroll Issue for Nested Switch Cases #68467
  • Refactor code to specified region #68466
  • Tools -> Options -> Text Editor -> C# -> Code Style -> Formatting Doesn't Always Show Examples #68465
  • the rename variable utility renames more variable then needed #68464
  • Reconsider license for Microsoft.CommonLanguageServerProtocol.Framework and related projects #68463

Closed

  • Invalid CS8602 calling base constructor when using primary constructors #68384
    17.7
  • Copy constructor should not be allowed to omit this initializer call in a type that is not a record #68345
    17.7
  • IDE0039 is not reported for implicitly typed lambda #68439
  • TestTypeAliases tests are failing in roslyn-ci main #68312
    17.7
  • C# 12 primary constructors + ObsoleteAttribute #68349
    17.7
  • Unable to specify abstract generic method with Task<T?> return #68473
  • CS3002 text is different for nullable Func<>? than non-nullable Func<>. #68438

PullRequests

Created

  • Primary ctors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Running PR val #68474
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Switch to new lower-overhead spell checking protocol #68426
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure we only ask for a symbol's documentation comment once #68452
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move off of recursion when determining pp-directive information for a file. #68460
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'use local function' with implicitly typed lambdas #68448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • `makeNotNullMembersMaybeNull` - skip primary constructor capture fields #68441
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Only record class can have a copy constructor. #68442
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Skip test that is causing issues in CI #68468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Disable MacOS on PRs #68470
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Set TypeDeclarationFlags.AnyMemberHasAttributes for a type with parameter list and a method-targeted attribute. #68444
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Inline Hints - Don't allow double click and insert params arguments #68434
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Implement IOperation support for inline array access #68373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Updated

  • Skip checks for overridden or hidden members in overload resolution with extension methods #68316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for 'primary header spans' in sticky-scroll. #68450
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix inserting new values with source generators #68451
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Add design for interceptors with nonzero arity #68218
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allocate less in GetTypeByMetadataName #68415
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge internal fork of LSP tools back into Roslyn #68461
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement extension member lookup (non-generic) #68342
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, untriaged
  • Update our 'delay until visible' logic to not throw cancellation exceptions #68382
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to primary constructors in IDE layer #68299
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refine parsing of potentially ambiguous casts/index expressions with collection literals #68456
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add assertions for shape of possibly intercepted call #68447
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support 'foreach' for inline arrays. #68297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Implement definite assignment and region analysis for inline array types #68339
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Fix 'Use Local Function' fixer in code style layer #68457
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Package Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Test.Utilities for razor #68417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow parsing `ref readonly` modifier #68164
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • [EnC] Upgrade change types for containing types #68368
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
